amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to permanently extending the income tax rate reductions for individuals and small businesses provided under Public Law 115-97.

vote.text: Amendment SA 55 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 45.

action.text: Amendment SA 55 proposed by Senator Crapo. (consideration: CR S454-455; text: CR S454) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to permanently extending the income tax rate reductions for individuals and small businesses provided under Public Law 115-97.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 55 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 45.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 55 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 45.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 55 proposed by Senator Crapo.
